title: Men's Cotton T-Shirts Oversized Unisex Short Sleeves Casual Loose Wash Solid Basic Tee Tops
description: 【Tips 】Hand wash or gentle machine wash in cold water, Hang or line dry,Do not bleach.Due to the vintage mineral wash treatment, it is quintessential to see pattern differences as well as color variances between every garment. Because the fabric is reduced in the mineral wash process, it is normal to see variations between garments color and thickness.

【Fabric】 Graphic Tees for women Men made of cotton, Super soft and cozy. The basic tee is super versatile and can be worn with any bottoms. The oversized t-shirt is friendly to any body type and fits perfectly no matter what kind of shape you have.It is recommended that women buy in accordance with the normal size, men who want the effect of oversize can buy a size larger.
【Feature】 Short Sleeve Oversized Tshirts, Crewneck, Solid colors and prints are available, loose-fitting tee shirts,A classic & fashion basic T-shirt for young women and men.

【Match】Easy to pair with leggings, skirts, shorts, jeans or pants. Can also be paired with super short pants with the top covering the pants, a stylish pairing with a missing bottom. Can be worn outside with a jacket or coat; can be worn in all seasons: spring, summer, fall and winter; durable.

【Occasion】This basic tshirt is a unisex tshirt for men, boys, girls, women fit. And this hip pop fashion tee shirt is perfect for for street, beach, home, daily, workout, party, night club, going out, holiday, vacation, active, sports, yoga, running, walking, cycling, climbing, weekend, cocktail, street, school, office.
